name: Bolster Bar Stool - Leather
description: Elevate your space with the Bolster Bar Stool - Leather – a harmonious blend of 1970's aesthetic and modern design. The bar stool features a stainless steel frame and soft leather seat cushion with bolster cushion back. The curved frame features sleek lines and a brushed finish to create an eye-catching focal point, making a bold statement in your space. Ideally used on a kitchen island or bar. The cushioned seat and bolster back cushion are upholstered in a warm khaki leather. The khaki is a dark neutral, able to blend with a rich array of other colours. The easy clean wipeable fabric is ideal for busy homes who don't want to compromise on design. The rich leather provides a tactile dimension to the piece, inviting you to settle in and enjoy. Also available in Canvas.
